response.overview: Sun Wukong was refined by the "Civil and Military Fire" in Taishang Laojun's alchemy furnace, which caused Sun Wukong to have great resentment and cause turmoil in heaven... After five hundred years of wind and rain, the famous master Tang Sanzang decided to follow the master to learn Buddhist scriptures from the west and turn his evil thoughts into gold. The hoop is the eye of the formation and seals it. Many years later, the golden hoop that served as the seal of the formation eye was accidentally touched by a spirit monkey, causing the seal to collapse. The demon monkey "Heaven Eater" was born, and "Heaven Eater" detonated resentment... Resentment so great that it could swallow all things...
response.title: 孙悟空时天魔候
